name: DEWM GAME
description:
It's the end of the world!

Evil creatures from hell have taken over the facility and installed their rouge A.I. overlord onto the mainframe. As the last surviving lab assistant, you must grab a gun and single-handedly wipe out the infestation! Explore the facility to collect the three keys required to breech the A.I.'s lair and destroy it forever. The only path to victory is stained with blood!

WASD to move, MOUSE to shoot and look around, ESC to quit.

This first year student project was made by Rhys Bormolini and Alex Bryans.
